title: New Paper: An Estimated 13 Million People Worldwide Killed by the COVID Vaccines
cleaned_text: That’s twice as many as were killed by the virus. In the US, the estimates are 670K Americans killed. Perhaps it’s time to declare that the vaccines are a worldwide emergency?

opengraph.title: New Paper: An Estimated 13 Million People Worldwide Killed by the COVID Vaccines
opengraph.description:
That's twice as many as were killed by the virus. In the US, the estimates are 670K Americans killed. Perhaps it's time to declare that the vaccines are a worldwide emergency?  
February 12, 2023 | Source: Steve Kirsch's Newsletter | by Steve Kirsch 
Executive summary

tweets:
In our new article, which will be posted this week, we estimate that ❗️13 MILLION❗️ were killed by the COVID-19 vaccines to date, worldwide.
The great majority old and frail.
The number for India alone is 3.7 million.
All-cause mortality is a powerful information source.

— Denis Rancourt (@denisrancourt) February 8, 2023
